alert.note: Alert for Dauphin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:55PM EDT until May 22 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DAUPHIN AND WESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES... At 354 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fort Indiantown Gap to Palmyra to Royalton to Siddonsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hershey, Middletown, Palmyra, Steelton, Annville, Hummelstown, Rutherford, Campbelltown, Highspire, Cleona, Royalton and Harper Tavern. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 246 to 259. Interstate 78 from mile markers 0 to 4. Interstate 81 from mile markers 79 to 96. Interstate 283 near mile marker 0. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
